content.p1: , driven by the open-source movement and other geeky stuff. Previously part of an interactive marketing company focused on lead generation from Denver, CO.
content.p2: , I commit to continuous learning and professional development, staying abreast of emerging design trends technological advancements, and industry best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions.

praxis.p1: From insight to interface, I design with people in mind. Merging aesthetics, purpose, and cutting-edge tech through Design Thinking and Human-Centered Design.
praxis.p2: Learning from tech experts early on made algorithms a core part of my toolkit, bridging design and engineering to craft seamless, refined digital experiences.

journey.p1: During my internship, I had the opportunity to refine and develop skills across various functions. HTML and CSS development, marketing initiatives, visual design, branding, and UX/UI design.
journey.p2: In multifaceted collaboration with managers and the development team, we successfully redesigned the interfaces and features of company's software.
journey.m2: Also played a key role in co-creating a platform that facilitates connecting individuals facing legal issues with specialized professionals.
journey.t3: Visual and <br class='block xl:hidden'> product designer
journey.p3: Early 2018, I held the role of a generalist designer, tasked with developing and managing all aspects of design and creative outputs for their product project.
journey.m3: Second half of the year, I collaborated with another company to design an open-source library of interface components.
journey.t4: Lead designer, <br class='block xl:hidden'> UI engineer
journey.p4: Today responsible for redesigning the company's advanced lead management platform, using React components to improve performance and scalability.

cases.title: Recent project
cases.description: A robust software for lead management, optimization, and distribution.

about.p1: Developed by Ifficient, Twyne is a robust software for lead management, optimization, and distribution, focused on monetization and real-time analytics.
about.p2: Targeted at the B2B market, it serves a few clients in volume, but with high ticket value and demanding customization.

goal.p1: Tackling one of the biggest challenges in digital design: creating a modular, scalable, and adaptable interface for highly complex software, with constant growth in features and requirements.
goal.p2: The visual approach needed to balance performance, readability, and continuous evolution, without requiring a restart for every new feature. Delivering clarity and control even in dense flows.

l1: A robust, strategic, and flexible UI kit.
Simplified UI that puts information up front.
Built to last, scale, and ease development.
proposal.p1: Each component carries decisions guided by performance, readability, and functional clarity, with special attention to business logic and the journey of corporate users.

l1: Reduced rework for the engineering team.
Foundation that supports new modules with minimal friction.
Strengthened product identity with a modern UI.

mobile.t1: Built on solid principles. Ready for any platform.

conclusion.p1: The modularity of the component library enables smart reuse, reducing complexity and increasing development speed.
conclusion.p2: Decisions on layout, typography, contrast, and spacing were calibrated to support dense data environments without compromising readability.
conclusion.p3: The result is an interface that adapts to the usage context without losing visual coherence or functional integrity.

damus.title: Damus
damus.description1: Damus is a client for the decentralized social network Nostr, available for iOS, iPad, and macOS. It allows users to post text, images, videos, and GIFs, as well as interact with other users through the sending of satoshis and encrypted private messages.
damus.description2: The goal of Damus is to offer an alternative to traditional social networks, focusing on freedom of expression and privacy.

ifficient.title: Ifficient
ifficient.description1: Interactive marketing company specialized in lead generation, based in Denver, CO.
ifficient.description2: There I led the design of Twyne and Path Evolution software, ensuring scalability and consistency in product evolution.

multiplayer.title: Multiplayer Orchestra
multiplayer.description1: Created by former students of UFMG's School of Music, Multiplayer explored soundtracks from series, movies, and games in their repertoire, connecting classical music to pop culture.
multiplayer.description2: I was invited to join the project as a designer, taking care of visual communication and providing support in event production.
